title: Apple squares
ingredients: ['125g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '60g butter, melted', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '100g caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '60g chopped apple', '60g finely chopped walnuts', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon']
